about_the_game:
Entangled is a 2D puzzle platformer where you control two quantum-entangled cat's at once. Solve each puzzle by making use of the two cats to escape a space research facility. Guide them through their journey.

An experiment subject has got loose in the Schrödinger division. The facility's security is impossible to breach using newtonian methods. Instead, by accident, it gets caught in an experimental quantum ray, splitting it between two dimensions. Now there are two felines separated along the 4th dimension, and they share the same mind.

Avoid getting caught or killed by automated machines. Explore around the space station to discover new mechanisms and gain new abilities. Experience unique movement in no gravity. Adapt to changing rules and new threats. Immerse in atmospheric soundscapes.

Features:
  • Control two characters simultaneously
  • Traverse through industrial levels
  • Discover new tools and mechanisms
  • Solve increasingly complicated puzzles
  • Adapt to changing rules and new threats.
  • Indulge in satisfying movement and sounds, accompanied with atmospheric music (headphones recommended)

name: Entangled

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
